summary: A quick follower mod i created just for practice.
descriptionHtml:
A quick follower mod i created just for practice, she can be found in the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun.
stats:
she can be anything from level 15 to 150, depending on what level you meet her at.
her starting equipment includes full draugr armour, and a steel sword of scorching.
she currently has 3 spells- flames
                                     - firebolt
                                     - invisibility
she is marriageable.
comment other features you want her to have.
author: Scarlie
